item.title: 01 Aug 2019
item.description: Weâ€™re losing strength and fine motor skills because we spend so much time on technology, surgeon warns audio Student surgeons now spend so much time on computers and tablets they have lost the ability to stitch, a top professor has warned. Roger Kneebone, professor of surgical education at Imperial College London, in the UK, said young people now had very little craft experience, which was a problem for the medical profession and surgeons in particular.
